title: Expo MIT 2023 - Togo Local producers exhibition
description: 'Made in Togo Expo 2023' is an annual exhibition showcasing Togo's businesses, craftsmen, producers and processors.
miniDescription: IoT environmental monitoring solution presented at MIT Expo 2023

title: Attendance Management System
description: An advanced attendance tracking system featuring facial recognition technology, real-time monitoring, and comprehensive reporting. The system includes mobile applications for both Android and iOS platforms, admin dashboard for HR management, and integration capabilities with existing HRMS systems.
miniDescription: AI-powered attendance system with facial recognition and mobile apps

title: SmartLoan - Ecobank Digital Lending Platform
description: A comprehensive digital lending platform developed for Ecobank Togo. This innovative solution streamlines the loan application process, integrates with core banking systems, and provides real-time credit scoring and risk assessment capabilities.
miniDescription: Digital lending platform with loan application documents processing

title: Sapientia Admin - Quiz Game Management System
description: A comprehensive admin panel for managing quizzes, users, and analytics. Features include real-time quiz monitoring, user management, and detailed reporting.
miniDescription: Admin panel for quiz management with real-time analytics

title: Business Intelligence Analytics Dashboard
description: A comprehensive BI dashboard solution providing real-time analytics and insights for business decision-making. Features include interactive visualizations, automated reporting, predictive analytics, and custom KPI tracking across multiple business units.
miniDescription: Real-time BI dashboard with predictive analytics and automated reporting

title: Enterprise Inventory Management System
description: A full-stack inventory management solution designed for enterprise-level operations. Features include real-time stock tracking, automated reordering, supplier management, barcode scanning integration, and comprehensive reporting with predictive inventory analytics.
miniDescription: Enterprise inventory system with automated reordering and analytics
